description: Error analytics for DeltaFi data sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count()
FROM "deltafi"."errors"
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotations['${annotation}'] IN (${annotationValue}))

SELECT time, sum(values) " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() as values 
FROM deltafi."errors" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s) GROUP BY time

SELECT dataSource, ' [' || if(empty(annotationValue),'none',annotationValue) || ']' AS annotationValue, value
FROM(
SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() value 
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))  
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 500)

SELECT time, dataSource || ' [' || if(empty(annotationValue),'none',annotationValue) || ']' AS annotationValue, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() AS values 
FROM deltafi."errors" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource,  sum(value)
FROM(
SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() value 
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))  
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 500) GROUP BY dataSource

SELECT time, dataSource, values " " FROM
(SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) as time, dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue, count() AS values 
FROM deltafi."errors" 
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) ) AND ( annotationValue IN (${annotationValue}))
GROUP BY dataSource, annotationValue, time 
ORDER BY time ASC WITH FILL STEP $__interval_s)

SELECT dataSource, count(cause) FROM (SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, cause, count() as values
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (dataSource IN (${flow})) AND ( tag IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, cause, tag
ORDER BY values DESC) GROUP BY dataSource

panels.title: Causes of Errors by Data Source

targets.rawSql:
SELECT dataSource, count(tag) as "Unique ${annotation} values" FROM (SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, count() as values
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (dataSource IN (${flow})) AND ( tag IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, tag
ORDER BY values DESC) GROUP BY dataSource

SELECT dataSource, cause, sum(values) FROM (SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, cause, count() as values
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (dataSource IN (${flow})) AND ( tag IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, cause, tag
ORDER BY values DESC) GROUP BY dataSource, cause

SELECT dataSource, tag as "value", sum(values) FROM (SELECT dataSource, annotations['${annotation}'] AS tag, cause, count() as values
FROM "deltafi"."errors" 
WHERE   ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and (dataSource IN (${flow})) AND ( tag IN (${annotationValue})) 
GROUP BY dataSource, cause, tag
ORDER BY values DESC) GROUP BY dataSource, tag

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT dataSource FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
list.label: Data Source
list.name: flow
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dataSource FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT flow FROM deltafiles WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) )
list.label: Annotation
list.name: annotation
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT arrayJoin(mapKeys(annotations)) AS keys FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) )
list.label: Annotation Value
list.name: annotationValue
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT annotations['${annotation}'] AS annotationValue FROM errors WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) and ( dataSource IN (${flow} ) )

title: Error Analytics
